title: Stopping subthreads from being display in the message tab
content: How do I stop all the messages subthreads from being populated on the message tab? For example, with I open a message with subthreads, all the trailing messages are displayed on the tab. The only way to get them off the tab is by clicking the x in every message. A real pain. I don't want this. How do I stop it?
